name: Florida Man Discovers Gravity
description:
IT ALL STARTED WITH A MAD SCIENTIST -   Scientist and known psychopath, Dr. Neutron created the Untested Blackhole Emitter Remote for the purpose of taking over the government.  A Florida man was visiting the Mad Scientist’s lab and thought the console, labeled UBER, would call the popular ride sharing service. Now he is in control of one of the most destructive forces on earth (or the universe)!   Can the man who put us in this predicament save us?

Florida Man Discovers Gravity! puts the player in the place of the famous Florida Man. He's accidentally created a black hole and now he has to guide it to NASA's Vehicle Assembly Building so they can get rid of it while trying to minimize the amount of damage he does along the way.

Game was created for Indie Galactic Space Jam 2018 by Team Dignitas: John Moran, Michael Bianchini, Christofer Padilla, Gabriel Lobo-Lam, Donald Lozen, and Abdulgani Fawaz. Special thanks to Scott Nubar and Chris Medrano for sound assistance!
